description:
The vpn_public_port column in the networks table should be made unique.

This will prevent from having the same port for distinct projects and VLANs.
title: Prevent duplicated VPN ports

comments.content:
The vpn_public_port column in the networks table should be made unique.

This will prevent from having the same port for distinct projects and VLANs.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~aloga

comments.content: We don't do unique constraints generally because it stops our lazy delete from working, but we could at least check for duplicates on create.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda

comments.content: This was rather old, and I think that this should have been fixed by https://review.openstack.org/#/c/34529/
